Title: The Thing Around Your Neck
Author: Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie
Description: Short story collection on Nigerian life at home and in the US, exploring migration and identity.

Title: Americanah
Author: Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie
Description: Love story and social novel about race, migration, and identity between Lagos, the US, and the UK.

Title: We Should All Be Feminists
Author: Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie
Description: Essay based on a TEDx talk arguing that everyone should embrace feminism.

Title: Half of a Yellow Sun
Author: Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie
Description: Historical novel about the Biafran War, following intertwined lives in southeastern Nigeria.
